strings.Value: {n}Tristian remains silent for a long time. When he finally opens his mouth, his voice is hoarse and tired.{/n} "I won't take much of your time, {name}."
"I've been meaning to ask you about something. This might seem stupid. Or arrogant. Or just insolent..." {n}Tristian stumbles and catches his breath.{/n} "I want to talk to you."

"I think you know what it's about. It's â€” it's what I've done. And what I haven't done." {n}The priest lowers his head and grows quiet.{/n} "But let's speak in private, far from curious ears. I will be at the viewing point, in the palace garden. Please come as soon as you can."
